meanings.definition: Coming after the thirty-ninth in a series.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the fortieth day after mine.
meanings.sent2: The fortieth house on the street was painted blue.
meanings.sent3: The fortieth cookie in the jar mysteriously disappeared.
meanings.sent4: The fortieth star in the sky shone the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The fortieth page of the book had a surprising twist.

meanings.sent1: She ate the fortieth piece of the cake.
meanings.sent2: The fortieth of the candies tasted the sweetest.
meanings.sent3: The fortieth marble in the collection was the shiniest.
meanings.sent4: His fortieth of the puzzle completed the picture.
meanings.sent5: The fortieth of the seeds grew into a beautiful flower.
